column4: hi I just install ubuntu server on my PC. But when I try start PC with just network and power cable it get stuck. but when I connect my keyboard on it it's strarts normaly
is there a solution for this
is is likely a setting in the bios.... it is set to error on 'no keyboard'
you need to get a monitor to make sure.... then go into the bios and set errors to none... or soemthing like that...
